doc.title: I Want to Be a Desi 2
doc.plot: DESI: Used colloquially to mean South Asian immigrants and their descendants, carrying a subtext of inclusiveness and unity... This hard-hitting six-minute documentary asks the perennial questions: "What does a non-Desi have to do to become a Desi?" and "What does the word DESI mean to you?" For anyone who's ever danced Bhangra in his kurta while watching a Bollywood epic and devouring hot, spicy curry this film is for you!
